title: Ticket #7764: Eliminate HTCondor-CE PTR requirements
description:
For its entire existence, HTCondor-CE has required reverse DNS entries to satisfy GSI auth requirements, which is causing some operational annoyances. I brought this up with Brian recently and he suggested that this shouldn't be required and that there's something wrong with our configuration that's causing us to hit the reverse DNS check code path. HTCondor-CE auth configuration is mostly contained in these two files:

  • https://github.com/htcondor/htcondor-ce/blob/master/config/01-common-auth-defaults.conf
  • https://github.com/htcondor/htcondor-ce/blob/master/config/01-ce-auth-defaults.conf

What can we do to remove the reverse DNS requirement and still support GSI/SSL/SciToken auth?
remarks:
